scripts.lint: yarn lint:prettier && yarn lint:stylelint && yarn lint:eslint
scripts.build: yarn workspace @dso-toolkit/css build && yarn workspace @dso-toolkit/core build && yarn workspace @dso-toolkit/react build && yarn workspace dso-toolkit build && yarn workspace dso-toolkit copy-libs && cpy packages/core/dist/dso-toolkit packages/dso-toolkit/dist/toolkit/core
scripts.build-www: yarn workspace website build && yarn workspace @dso-toolkit/storybook build && yarn workspace @dso-toolkit/react build-www
scripts.e2e: start-server-and-test 'http-server --silent --port 45000 packages/storybook/www' http://localhost:45000 'percy exec -- cypress run'
scripts.clear-node-modules: npx rimraf node_modules packages/core/node_modules packages/dso-toolkit/node_modules packages/leaflet/node_modules packages/react/node_modules packages/react-leaflet/node_modules packages/sources/node_modules
scripts.start:leaflet: yarn workspace @dso-toolkit/core clear && cross-env DSO_ENV=leaflet yarn node scripts/start.js --mode leaflet
scripts.start:react-leaflet: yarn workspace @dso-toolkit/core clear && cross-env DSO_ENV=react-leaflet yarn node scripts/start.js --mode react-leaflet
